Optional parameters:

	-a    [Number of academic terms]
	-d    [Number of departments]
	-r    [Number of rooms per building]
	-seed [Random seed]
	-h    [Percent of hard constraints]
	-s    [Percent of soft constraints]
	-pl   [Percent of lecturer]
	-ps   [Percent of students]
	-pt   [Percent of tutors]
